Text:
A few days after Halloween has passed, Delta asks Cid
to meet her in the woods...
Boss man! Over here!
Hey, Delta... Wait, what's with that outfit?
I'm a witch!

Boss man, did you hear? I totally stole the show at
Halloween!
Ah, yeah, I heard something about that.

(Well, all I heard from Alpha and the others was that
the financial results were disastrous...but I'll keep
that to myself.)
Well done, Delta!
Heehee!

Delta radiates with joy as if she can barely contain
her excitement. She places a hand on her waist and
proudly puffs out her chest.

You seem to be in a really good mood. Is it because
you stole the show?

That's part of it, but I'm also feeling great in this
witch outfit!

Oh, you like it that much? You usually hate frilly
clothes that restrict your movements.
Witch outfits are different!

Witches are so strong that they could even give you
a run for your money, Boss man.
(Is she talking about the Goddess' Trial?)

In other words...a witch's outfit is a sign of
strength!
I see...

Although not entirely convinced, Cid decides to
accept Delta's theory and continues to listen.
But I'm strong too.
Huh? Yeah, you are.

By combining my own strength with the strength of
a powerful witch, I can become even stronger!

When I wear a witch's outfit, I can use a witch's
power! ...I think!
Ah, I get it now...

(So that's the setting. It's one of those tropes
where an ordinary student transforms and
gains the ability to fight.)
In that case, maybe you can use magic now.
Graaarf? Magic?

It's an incredible ability. For example, with earth
magic, you could hurl giant chunks of dirt.
Giant chunks of dirt... Like this?

Delta raises her staff and swings it across the
ground as if it were a golf club, sending a
sizeable chunk of dirt flying at an incredible
speed.
...Whoa.
I did earth magic!
Boss man, what's next?! Teach me more magic!
Huh? Oh, sure. Let's see...

Now that you've mastered earth magic, how about wind
magic? You could create a tornado with your staff.
Tornado... Swirly swirly!

Delta raises her staff again and vigorously swings it
around with a whirling motion.
Uh...
Boss maaaan! I maaaade a tornaaaado!

A strong wind swirls around Delta. She shouts out
amidst the sound of the wind.
Whaaaat's next?!
M-Maybe stop the tornado first?!
Graaarf! Boss man, next! What's the next magic?!
Well... L-Let's see...

Next... How about fire? You could conjure a fireball
with your staff.

A fireball... Fire...staff... Hmm...mmm... Oh!
I've got it! How about this!!!

Saying this, Delta rapidly spins her staff on a stone
lodged in the ground, generating sparks that ignite
flames at the tip of the staff.
And then, I'll take this...and send it flying! Hyah!

The ignited tip of the staff flies off like
a fireball...

I did it! Boss man! Did you see that?! My magic is
perfect!
...Yeah, sure.

Guess it's a case of every tool being a weapon if
held right.

Cid responds with a smile, neither confirming nor
denying anything.
Does that mean I got stronger?! Yaaaayyy!
Now I'm a real witch! Thank you, Boss man!

(It's not entirely accurate to call her a witch...but
look how happy she is. I'll just leave it at that.)

Cid affectionally observes the ecstatic
self-proclaimed "witch"...
